title: Ученица Мессинга
overview: A mystical melodrama about the fate of the student of Wolf Messing, partially based on the memories of Olga Migunova.Possessing a unique extrasensory gift and extraordinary abilities, Olga becomes first an assistant to the famous pop artist-mentalist, and then herself a famous artist, showing "psychological experiences" on the stage. After going through trials and temptations, happiness and pain, tragic events and success, the death of loved ones and her own doubts, she finds her true destiny ...
